title: Infrastructure Health Monitor
tagline: Python-based monitoring tool with automated checks and alerts
problem: Needed visibility into system health and uptime for cloud infrastructure.
solution: Built monitoring with Prometheus + Grafana, automated alerts via Slack integration.
impact: Reduced MTTR by 40%, improved uptime to 99.9%.
challenges: Alert fatigue and tuning thresholds for accuracy
learning: Improved skills in observability and incident response

title: EKS Self-Healing Cluster
tagline: Terraform-driven EKS cluster with self-healing and high availability
problem: Manual recovery from node failures slowed down deployments and reduced reliability.
solution: Provisioned EKS with Terraform, added auto-scaling groups and health checks for self-healing.
impact: Cluster recovers automatically from node failures, reducing downtime by 70%.
challenges: Terraform state management and Kubernetes node replacement logic
learning: Deepened knowledge of IaC and Kubernetes resilience patterns
